purpose: Facilitates cryptocurrency payment processing for merchants and AI agents, allowing them to accept a wide range of cryptocurrencies.
principle: Integrates with popular e-commerce platforms like Shopify and WHMCS, utilizing JavaScript for seamless crypto transactions.
reusability: Offers easy integration with existing e-commerce platforms through plugins and APIs, supporting multiple cryptocurrencies.
limitations: Limited to merchants using supported platforms; requires understanding of cryptocurrency handling and regulations.
name: MugglePay
description: Make Payments Crypto Native. MugglePay makes merchants and AI agents accept crypto and sell more with it.
highlight: Enables merchants to accept cryptocurrency payments seamlessly, enhancing their sales potential.
